before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"dngtm","text":"Sample collection and preparation:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"141un","text":"Seawater was filtrated using Sylphium pods with 0.45µm filters. Using a syringe, water was removed and filters dried.\nTo lyse cells and preserve DNA, 3mL of Tris-EDTA-SDS Buffer was added to each Sylphium pod. Sylphium pods were freezed quickly after.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ei494","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drag2","text":"Lab work:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ksvi","text":"Prepare Buffer B5 and Proteinase K.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1mq0","text":"Put all equipment (micropipettes, disposable tips, microtubes, columns, ethanol, B3, BW and B5) in UV cabinet and\nlight UV for 20 mins.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"566r3","text":"Set incubator to 70°C and heat Buffer BE to 70 °C.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt7p2","text":"Vortex and spin samples.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ftian","text":"This DNA extraction protocol aims at extracting total genomic DNA from filtered seawater samples suspended in Tris-EDTA-SDS Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9duh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvdhn","text":"Our protocol mostly follows the NucleoSpin Tissue protocol (qr.mn-net.com/qr/(IFU)740952), section 5 (Standard protocol for human or animal tissue and cultured cells). It starts at step 3, with 200µL of sample, and adds 25µL Proteinase K to the original step. To maximize DNA concentration, Buffer BE is heated at 70°C, and elution is repeated twice with the same 100µL of Buffer BE with 3 min incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"fipil","text":"- Pipettes : monochannel p100, p200, p1000 and corresponding filter tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65l45","text":"- 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"foqhd","text":"- Ethanol (96-100%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"568fk","text":"Add   of   to a microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"95oiq","text":"Add   Buffer B3 and   Proteinase K solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"65o22","text":"Vortex vigorously.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f98","text":"Incubate at 70 °C for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cvoe1","text":"Vortex briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":null,"entityMap":null,"group_guid":"B98F305774794D30850CB3A930DE0625","guid":""}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dlu1e","text":"Add   ethanol (96 – 100 %) to the sample and vortex vigorously.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"210","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3215h","text":"For each  , place one NucleoSpin Tissue Column into a Collection Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"718s1","text":"Apply the   to the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9a5bs","text":"Centrifuge for   at 11,000 x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"93gpg","text":"Discard Collection Tube with flowthrough and place the column in a new Collection Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"copied":true,"group_guid":"B98F305774794D30850CB3A930DE0625","guid":""}},"1":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"copied":true,"group_guid":"B98F305774794D30850CB3A930DE0625","guid":""}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Elute highly pure DNA in two steps with Buffer BE heated at 70°C
